channel.title: What is the point of king?
channel.description: Let's be honest mastermind will only use little bird on king basically driving the whisper meta into the ground, but what is the point of king now? Like it or not, before the update king was used to whisper claims at to give leads and suspicions basically being the leader or "king", but now with the whisper meta driven into the ground what's the point. So what's he now? A slightly better alchemist truth potion? Well what's king going to do just randomly pick a player, since he isn't given logs or anything that may make him check someone? Btw this is the complete opposite in cult games if cult don't spawn with apostle then King is extremely op.

item.title: What is the point of king?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The exception is late game where the game has been simplified enough to gamesolve as BD

Read full topic

item.title: What is the point of king?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
With open claiming you can have a minority of players outing which gives the remaining players enough info to work with but not enough info for scum to gamesolve

item.title: What is the point of king?
item.dc:creator: Biperspectival
item.description:
the question though, is what is the definition of failure? I think that in many ways, letting only unseen and a good king have all the claims might still be better than letting everyone have claims. With a perfect king, it is obviously true. Even with an imperfect king, it can still be better than giving the nk claims as well or, even worse, having the bd stand around doing nothing

Read full topic
item.source: What is the point of king?

item.title: What is the point of king?
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Remember. 55 is only against cult. It’s 100% failure against Unseen

item.title: What is the point of king?
item.dc:creator: Biperspectival
item.description:
My point is that saying the WM isn’t worth doing isn’t true if there is no better alternative, and I’m not sure that we’ve found one yet

Read full topic

item.title: What is the point of king?
item.dc:creator: Planterror
item.description:
I find the point of the king is to be a leader for the BD. comparing it to the town of salem meta, where jailor outs himself day 1. People need a leader to keep track of everything or else things can fall apart.

Read full topic
